name: openai-chatgpt-adhoc
displayName: ChatGPT â€“ Work with VS Code on macOS
description: This extension enables the ChatGPT application to read files you have open in Visual Studio Code. It does not introduce any capabilities directly to Visual Studio Code.

untrustedWorkspaces.description: The workspace must be trusted for ChatGPT to interact with content in your Visual Studio Code workspace.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile && if [ "$OBFUSCATE_EXTENSION" = "true" ]; then javascript-obfuscator out --output out; fi
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
